verbose_text: When the cells were co-transfected with miRNA-184 mimics and HIF1AN, the expression of alpha-SMA, GTGF, COL1A1, and COL3A1 at mRNA level was apparently decreased when compared with miRNA-184 mimic transfected cells, which was strengthened when transfected with miRNA-184 inhibitor.
evidence: expression of alpha-SMA, GTGF, COL1A1, and COL3A1
